title: Scrambled egg

properties.value: Scrambled eggs are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking an uncooked egg on cooking range, requiring level 13 Cooking and granting 50 experience when successful. Players may burn the stew while cooking one, resulting in a burnt egg; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 48 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 hitpoints.

Item ID7078

Scrambled eggs are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking an uncooked egg on cooking range, requiring level 13 Cooking and granting 50 experience when successful. Players may burn the stew while cooking one, resulting in a burnt egg; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 48 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 hitpoints.

At level 23 Cooking, it can also be combined with a tomato to make egg and tomato topping, which provides no experience but does provide one of the two final ingredients for an egg potato.

Due to all the ingredients being available in a player owned house kitchen, it can be made by the player that owns the house (POH) (not by a Butler) when battling others in a combat ring.

[[File:Scrambled egg detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Scrambled eggs''' are a type of [[food]] that can be obtained by cooking an [[uncooked egg]] on [[cooking range]], requiring level 13 [[Cooking]] and granting 50 experience when successful. Players may burn the stew while cooking one, resulting in a [[burnt egg]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 48 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 hitpoints.

At level 23 [[Cooking]], it can also be combined with a [[tomato]] to make [[egg and tomato]] topping, which provides no [[experience]] but does provide one of the two final ingredients for an [[egg potato]].

Due to all the ingredients being available in a [[player-owned house|player owned house]] [[kitchen]], it can be made by the player that owns the house ([[POH]]) (not by a [[Butler]]) when battling others in a [[combat ring]].
